name: Innkeeper Solstice
description:
Innkeeper Solstice is a fan made 2D simulation game inspired by The Wandering Inn web series by Pirateaba. Play as a young woman named Erin Solstice who is brand new [Innkeeper] in a world of magic and monsters. Feed meals to your guests and level up! Build up your inn and abilities to be able to handle larger crowds and cook different foods. This game contains no spoilers! 

Let us know your review of the game here

Controls:

First time players are highly encouraged to read the in-game instructions before playing!

Move character with WASD.

Left Click - interact with buttons.

Right Click - split item stack in hand

Right Click (On Table) - pick up/put down item.

Right Click (On Highlighted Object) - interact with highlighted object

This is a passion game. It might not be great, but it's free.

Created by Entropy Games.
